title: Business Chicks Mixer – New York
desc: Networking is the foundation of success. At least, that?s what we believe here at Business Chicks! Whether you?re a seasoned business owner or new to the game; climbing the corporate ladder or just keen to meet new people, then attending our Networking Mixers is one of the smartest moves you?ll ever make. Here's why: You?ll have the marvellous opportunity to connect with kindred spirits and like-minded women You?ll network over delicious canap?s and a glass of wine or two (it's sounding better already, right?) The networking is expertly facilitated by our team, and we'll share our top networking tips so you get the most out of the evening. Goodbye awkward! Everyone is there for the same reason you are: to mix and meet. Why not bring a girlfriend or be brave and come alone? You never know what opportunities might open up for you. You?re guaranteed to have a good time. Networking the Business Chicks way is fun and non-intimidating. You?ll leave feeling empowered and inspired. There?s nothing like meeting a bunch of brilliant, supportive women to make you feel like you can achieve anything you set your mind to. So what are you waiting for? Come and join us - we can't wait to welcome you! A special thank you to? Loews Regency Hotel
